Get Ready to Go Viral

02 May 2010

I have no idea why this brilliant video has only 173 views on YouTube. In fact, I just finished reviewing the Top 10 You Tube Videos of all Time, and I think this little gem is ready to go BIG.

It might be that I have Fiesta Farms and grandmas on the brain as we get ready to roll out the Apron Strings series this week. But, I don’t think so. I think I know genius when I see it.

Tell me, am I wrong?
